headline: Albemarle Declares a New Organizational Framework
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) is among the 13 Best Magnesium Stocks to Invest in Now. Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) has announced an improved organizational structure, which went into effect on August 11, 2025, to increase agility and operating efficiency. The newly appointed chief operations officer, Mark Mummert, will continue to report to CEO Kent Masters while managing […]
